description:
Deciding that he has no choice but to become more ruthless if he hopes to beat the Zeta, Mashymre uses the new mobile suit "Zssa" to attack the residential area of the city. Concerned about the hospital where Kamille is being treated, Fa intercepts it with the Methuss as Astonaige boards the Zeta, trying to prove that Judau isn`t as special as the others think he is.
Source: crunchyroll
